name: Super Maria Melody Maker
description:
Controls:  WASD Keys : movement Player one, Arrow Keys: movement player two, Mouse for clicking play button at the collected music boxes, escape for exiting full screen in browser

This is just a prototype now.
The game will maybe change a lot or maybe do not even progress anyhow.

Credits:

Sprites:

Both sisters, enemies, level, most of what you see ingame: https://opengameart.org/content/cute-platformer-sisters by https://opengameart.org/users/master484Collectibles (Boxes): https://dalton5000.itch.io/
Play button, switch sign in upper row for melody : Tzoop

Music:
Music was taken from: https://soundcloud.com/parrcome-26689653
by parr come

Game Engine  used is Godot Game Engine, Scripting language used is gdscript.

Godot Engine is a free and open source game engine, it can be downloaded here: https://godotengine.org

Programming and Game design, level design and so on: Tzoop
